sentences.en: ...the birthplace of Krishna, another god of the Hindu pantheon.
sentences.cn: ...另一位印度教诸神克利世那的出生地。

sentences.en: As the Taoist pantheon developed, it came to mirror the imperial bureaucracy in heaven and hell.
sentences.cn: 道教万神殿发展的时候, 它成为了通过天堂和地狱反映出皇帝官僚作风的一面镜子.

sentences.en: Ewok spiritualism has a wide pantheon of gods and spirits.
sentences.cn: 伊渥克人的精神至上的观念里有着各种各样的神灵.

sentences.en: Finally the National Assembly discussed and approved, Dumas became the first 72 buried in the Pantheon.
sentences.cn: 最后,国民议会讨论通过, 大仲马成为第72位安葬于先贤祠的人.

sentences.en: Foucault, Michel , 1972, The Archaeology of Knowledge, Pantheon, NY.
sentences.cn: 傅柯, 米歇尔,1998, 《知识考古学》,谢强, 马月译,三联, 北京.

sentences.en: In the pantheon of ancient gods she appears to me to be unusually reasonable.
sentences.cn: 在古代诸神中,她的存在在我看来非常合情合理.

sentences.en: In the pantheon of classic modern buildings, Utzon's creation has the status of myth.
sentences.cn: 在现代建筑的经典之中, 乌特松的这一创造颇具神秘色彩.

sentences.en: Marie Curie's remains were exhumed and interred in the Pantheon.
sentences.cn: 玛丽·居里的遗体被移出葬在先贤祠中.

sentences.en: Pantheon is the best entry - key, the best auditorium, the true wealth of textbooks.
sentences.cn: 先贤祠是最好的入门匙, 最佳的讲堂 、 最真实丰富的课本.

sentences.en: Right in front of the Pantheon, there is an obelisk.
sentences.cn: 万神殿的正面有个方尖碑.

sentences.en: The amazing Pantheon has stopped me in my tracks .
sentences.cn: 神奇的万神殿当场让我驻足。

sentences.en: The ambiguity about craft was widespread among the pantheon of Greek philosophers.
sentences.cn: 关于手工艺的这些含混之处也在古希腊哲学家中广泛流传.

sentences.en: The greatest members of the Pantheon imbued a portion of their power of the flights'leaders.
sentences.cn: 万神殿众多的神把一部分力量注入这个些龙群的五个首领.

sentences.en: The Pantheon is the greatest and the best - preserved Roman temple, which was built in 27 B.C.
sentences.cn: 建立于公元前27年并于公元2世纪重建的罗马万神殿是最伟大、保存最好的罗马神殿.

sentences.en: Thor : Never mind, Dad, he just said he didn't want to be in the pantheon.
sentences.cn: 别在意, 爸, 他只是说他不想加入神系.

trans.tran_cn: 万神庙，（一国或一民族信奉的）众神，名流，伟人
trans.tran_en: a group of famous and important people
